text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here
Yes it's me bob..
Join me for learning street with bob..
“Kids, let us learn some words and objects at our homes!”
I love my home comfortable and warm
My room and my little things
All the memories they bring
And the old telephone
That goes trrring trrring trrring
I love my home comfortable and warm
My room and my little things
All the memories they bring
And the old telephone
That goes trrring trrring trrring
My room has a bed and a cupboard and a desk
How many books and toys I keep Is anybody’s guess
The bathroom has toothpaste with a toothbrush just for me
And soap and a tub to clean up as you can see
In the kitchen there’s a fridge with a ton of food at least
And cooking things that mom uses to cook up quite a feast
There is a big table and four pretty chairs
Plates with knives and forks arranged in pairs
I love my home comfortable and warm
My room and my little things All the memories they bring
And the old telephone
That goes trrring trrring trrring
I love my home comfortable and warm
My room and my little things All the memories they bring
And the old telephone
That goes trrring trrring trrring
The living room has a TV and large windows and a door
When I sit on the sofa with my family I could not ask for more
The windows have curtains and the walls have photo frames
I also have a console to play my games
We have things to help us washing machine vacuum cleaner

Clothes hang on hangars in cupboards
And plants make the house look greener
For rain we have umbrellas and bags for travelling far
In the garage we keep my bicycle and a car
I love my home comfortable and warm
My room and my little things All the memories they bring
And the old telephone
That goes trrring trrring trrring
I love my home comfortable and warm
My room and my little things All the memories they bring
And the old telephone
That goes trrring trrring trrring
